entry.sentence: But Alteichen Castle lay apart from the hustle and bustle of the world , and besides , Rosemarie was so filled with her own sad fate that she faced this outbreak of war with a dull composure .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (CC But) (S (NP (NNP Alteichen) (NNP Castle)) (VP (VBD lay) (ADVP (RB apart)) (PP (IN from) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN hustle) (CC and) (NN bustle)) (PP (IN of) (NP (DT the) (NN world))))))) (, ,) (CC and) (S (ADVP (RB besides)) (, ,) (NP (NNP Rosemarie)) (VP (VBD was) (ADVP (RB so)) (VP (VBN filled) (PP (IN with) (NP (PRP$ her) (JJ own) (JJ sad) (NN fate))) (SBAR (IN that) (S (NP (PRP she)) (VP (VBD faced) (NP (NP (DT this) (NN outbreak)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NN war)))) (PP (IN with) (NP (DT a) (JJ dull) (NN composure))))))))) (. .)))
